Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and potential impact on your business or lifestyle, I am offering this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $995000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate, tailored to maximize your benefits. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a valuable addition to your world. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $995,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $995,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
